core.name: Spirit of Loyalty
core.description:
Leader Bonus
Spirit of Loyalty: Increases whole team's physical damage by 18% upon generating a 20-hit or more combo.

subskills.name: Spirit of Loyalty
subskills.description: Increases whole team's physical damage by 18% upon generating a 20-hit or more combo.

core.name: Combo Skill: Whirling Petals
core.description:
Soaring whirlwind slash that knocks surrounding enemies airborne.
Whirling Slash: 7x 60% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Iaido Whirlwind
subskills.description: Switch entry unleashes Insta-Slash. Triggers QTE when enemy is knocked airborne. Enters battle with a Storm Slasher that deals 225% + 400% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Airborne Whirlwind
subskills.description: Triggers a combo ATK by tap-and-holding the [ATK] button during any Basic ATK.

subskills.name: Double Whirlwind
subskills.description: Tap the [ATK] button during Combo ATK to unleash 1 more Combo ATK. DMG dealt equals 100.0% of the 1st hit of the 1st combo attack.

subskills.name: Piercing Blade
subskills.description: Increases Crit Rate by 20.0% and Crit DMG by 30.0% against an enemy with breached elite shield.

core.name: Amaterasu
core.description:
Activates Valkyrie SP burst to unleash a forward slash.
Amaterasu: Deals up to 1150% ATK of Physical DMG.
SP Cost: 50

subskills.name: Soul Power
subskills.description: Each strike of Amaterasu deals an additional 18.0% ATK of Fire DMG. Can be triggered up to 17 times.

subskills.name: Spirit Blade
subskills.description: Gain 15 Max SP in battle. Amaterasu costs 20 more SP, but activates Valkyrie mode after casting, boosting all attacks for 5.0s.

subskills.name: Sakura no Haku
subskills.description: Valkyrie mode deals augmented blade attacks, with each hit dealing additional 20.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

core.name: Phantom Blade
core.description:
Teleports quickly to evade enemy attacks.
Time Fracture: Triggers Time Fracture upon an Ultimate Evasion, slowing all enemies for 3 sec. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Insta-Slash
subskills.description: Triggered by tapping the [ATK] button upon a successful evasion. When Time Fracture is triggered by a successful evasion, Insta-Slash deals additional 150.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Inner Shade
subskills.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20.0% during Time Fracture triggered by own evasionsion.

subskills.name: Shadow Razor
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 4.0s.

core.name: Gotamashiki
core.description:
Attacks with a swift penta-slash.
1st Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 120% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 75% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 80% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 250% ATK of AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Relentless Slash
subskills.description: Increases Attack Speed by 15.0% when Combo Hit Count exceeds 20.

subskills.name: Blood Sakura
subskills.description: Basic attacks have a 20.0% chance to bleed enemies, dealing 40% ATK of Physical DMG every 0.5s for 8s and inflicting 2 Bleed Trauma.

subskills.name: Night Sakura
subskills.description: Final hit of Basic ATK increases Combo ATK DMG by 20% for 6.0s.
